definition: to hack to death/to kill with an ax
to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb

sentences.english: Two dogs for Guo cut prisoners, also to take eight finger blood hacked joe.
sentences.chinese: 二狗顶替郭割掳，同样就要担下砍死乔八指的血债。

sentences.english: Xulhaz and a companion were hacked to death by unidentified attackers on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 曼南和一名同伴星期一被身份不明的袭击者砍死。

sentences.english: Immediately led a group of soldiers rushed to the HanQinHu side will the disorderly knife chop down dead.
sentences.chinese: 便立即带领一群士兵冲到韩擒虎身边将其乱刀砍死。

sentences.english: As people emerged from their homes they were either hacked to death or shot.
sentences.chinese: 人们从家里出来，有的被砍死，有的中枪。

sentences.english: The oxen were shot or poleaxed.
sentences.chinese: 牛被枪打死或用屠斧砍死。

sentences.english: The slaves slew their master with swords .
sentences.chinese: 奴隶们用乱刀砍死主人。

definition: to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
to attack with a bladed weapon
